[@SoapDog](@gaQw6z30GpfsW9k8V5ED4pHrg8zmrqku24zTSAINhRg=.ed25519) 

I think that might be a bit much for me, maybe we could each drink 126 beers and then share the remainder with a friend? üçª For real though, Patchfox is great and I'm super appreciative that you're building something so cool. Happy to help however I can.

Oh, did that get fixed with ssb-markdown's `toUrl()` option? Fixing the ssb-markdown docs has been on my todo list...
